description: Edits the personal information of the user.

parameters.name: personal_information
parameters.description: New personal information to be saved.

given_name.description: A name given to a individual to differentiate them from members of such group or family. May be referred as "family name" or "forename".

middle_name.description: A name given to a individual to differentiate them from members of such group or family with members having same given name.

family_name.description: A name given to a individual to represent its family or group.

name_prefix.description: Prefix of the name to vocal the individual, such as "Mr.".

name_postfix.description: Postfix of the name to vocal the individual, such as "-san", which may expand to something like "Suguro-san".

nickname.description: A nick given to an individual, generally pronounced informally.

phonetic_representation.description: Phonetic representation of the name of the user.

201.description: Personal information of given user is updated.

name_postfix.description: Postfix of the name to vocal the individual, such as "-san", which may expand to something like "Suguro-san".

phonetic_representation.description: Phonetic representation of the name of the user.
